member.name: T:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionConfiguration
member.summary: Contains the methods required to ensure that the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection configuration is valid.

member.name: M:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionConfiguration.#ctor(Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the class.
member.param: The ASP.NET Core Data Protection provider.

member.name: M:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionConfiguration.PostConfigure(System.String,OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionOptions)
member.summary: Populates the default OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection validation options and ensures that the configuration is in a consistent and valid state.
member.param: The name of the options instance to configure, if applicable.

member.name: T:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionHandlers.ValidateDataProtectionToken
member.summary: Contains the logic responsible of validating tokens generated using Data Protection.

member.name: P:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionHandlers.ValidateDataProtectionToken.Descriptor
member.summary: Gets the default descriptor definition assigned to this handler.

member.name: T:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionOptions
member.summary: Provides various settings needed to configure the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection validation integration.

member.name: P:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionOptions.DataProtectionProvider
member.summary: Gets or sets the data protection provider used to create the default data protectors used by the OpenIddict Data Protection validation services. When this property is set to null, the data protection provider is directly retrieved from the dependency injection container.

member.name: P:OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionOptions.Formatter
member.summary: Gets or sets the formatter used to read Data Protection tokens.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionBuilder
member.summary: Exposes the necessary methods required to configure the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection integration.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionBuilder.Configure(System.Action{OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionOptions})
member.summary: Amends the default OpenIddict validation ASP.NET Core Data Protection configuration.
member.param: The delegate used to configure the OpenIddict options.
member.remarks: This extension can be safely called multiple times.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionBuilder.UseDataProtectionProvider(Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider)
member.summary: Configures OpenIddict to use a specific data protection provider instead of relying on the default instance provided by the DI container.
member.param: The data protection provider used to create token protectors.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionBuilder.UseFormatter(OpenIddict.Validation.DataProtection.IOpenIddictValidationDataProtectionFormatter)
member.summary: Configures OpenIddict to use a specific formatter instead of relying on the default instance.
member.param: The formatter used to read tokens.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionExtensions
member.summary: Exposes extensions allowing to register the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection validation services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionExtensions.UseDataProtection(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationBuilder)
member.summary: Registers the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection validation services in the DI container.
member.param: The services builder used by OpenIddict to register new services.
member.remarks: This extension can be safely called multiple times.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionExtensions.UseDataProtection(Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationBuilder,System.Action{Microsoft.Extensions.DependencyInjection.OpenIddictValidationDataProtectionBuilder})
member.summary: Registers the OpenIddict ASP.NET Core Data Protection validation services in the DI container.
member.param: The services builder used by OpenIddict to register new services.
The configuration delegate used to configure the validation services.
member.remarks: This extension can be safely called multiple times.
